summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates lowâ€‘level raw CUDA kernel and module capabilities, covering compilation, loading of different binary formats, context switching, compiler flag handling, complex number support, dynamical parallelism, raw pointer usage, and template specialization.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the library's raw CUDA interface by exercising a wide range of compilation and execution scenarios, thereby preventing regressions and ensuring reliable performance for advanced GPU programming features.
